description: This initiative focuses on cultivating mushrooms in a rural area, driven by a personal journey of transformation and connection to nature. The founder, inspired by his agricultural roots and a desire for fulfillment, faced numerous challenges in establishing a successful mushroom farm. Through perseverance and learning from experts, he developed a simplified cultivation method that emphasizes education and sustainability. The initiative aims to promote the nutritional and medicinal benefits of mushrooms while fostering community awareness and appreciation for alternative food sources, ultimately aspiring to create a space for teaching and sharing knowledge about fungiculture.
name: PRIMITIVO MUSHROOM COFFEE
